name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Cybersecurity Engineer with 8 years of experience enhancing security postures in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Cloud Security**, **Network Security**, and **Cybersecurity**, I leverage advanced skills in **SaaS**, **SIEM**, **EDR**, and security frameworks such as **MITRE ATT&CK** and **NIST** for effective risk management and compliance. My solid understanding of **Firewall**, **IDS**, **IPS**, and threat detection tools like **Nmap**, **Nessus**, and **OpenVAS** allows me to create and enforce security policies that protect sensitive data. 

Alongside my cybersecurity expertise, I excel in full-stack development utilizing languages like JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter. I have hands-on experience with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My background in cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS** supports my ability to integrate security into enterprise-grade applications while complying with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. With a focus on developing secure, high-performance solutions, I am also adept at building machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
